name: Constellation (VikkiRuttle)
description:
◄ Screensaver jam - Create something in the spirit of the beloved screensaver!! ►

'Constellation' is a small screensaver-like game where you are transported through space to observe a multitude of varying planets each with their own unique appearance and movements. It is designed to be a short and calming experience set to provide a brief escape from daily life.

My games can also be found on my website

Any and all feedback is welcome - @VRuttle

Cheers,

Vikki =]
